head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths PUDALOV, DR. IRVING

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths PUDALOV, DR. IRVING

block.p: PUDALOV--Dr. Irving, on December 30, 2006. Formerly of Wantagh L.I. presently of Hollywood, FL. Founder of Wantagh Animal Hospital. Beloved husband of the late Mary. Devoted father of Dr. Mitchell Pudalov and Barbara Hubschman. Loving father-in-law of Linda and Harold. Dear brother of Judge Murray Pudalov. Adored grandfather of Eric, Emily, Adam and Julie. Services Wednesday 1 pm at ''Guttermans'' 8000 Jericho Tpk. Woodbury L.I.
